description: Manage the metadata for a storage queue.

commands.name: az storage queue metadata show
commands.summary: Return all user-defined metadata for the specified queue.
commands.syntax:
az storage queue metadata show --name
                               [--account-key]
                               [--account-name]
                               [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                               [--connection-string]
                               [--queue-endpoint]
                               [--sas-token]
                               [--timeout]
examples: az storage queue metadata show -n myqueue --account-name mystorageaccount

commands.name: az storage queue metadata update
commands.summary: Set user-defined metadata on the specified queue.
commands.syntax:
az storage queue metadata update --name
                                 [--account-key]
                                 [--account-name]
                                 [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                 [--connection-string]
                                 [--metadata]
                                 [--queue-endpoint]
                                 [--sas-token]
                                 [--timeout]
examples: az storage queue metadata update -n myqueue --metadata a=b c=d --account-name mystorageaccount
